title: gOvindarAjEna rakSitOham
sahitya:
gOvindarAjEna rakSitOham sadA


anupallavi

 gOvardhana giri dharENa gOpa strI mOhitEna


caraNam   vasudEva kumArENa vAsavAdi vanditEna kaustubha maNi bhUSitEna karuNAsAgara
varENa bhAsamAna cidambarapuri vilasitEna guruguhamOdita mEcabauLi rAgENa santOSitEna
